comment: I've found someone to share nyt dreams with here rey nd that's u, my dear cooking partner. The way u tell stories r really awesome 😎, am gonna miss you so much ..manam bayata kaluddam and trips ki veldam..😻, don't forget that I am always there for uu🫣, dreams kuda cheppukundam 😜..be happy pandu❤
name: Supraja Guguloth

comment: Sarvani, one cannot meet a more crazy girl than you😀 Your energetic and jolly personality brings positive energy to those you meet. Thank you for teaching me such useful telugu words which I hopefully wouldn't have to use😉 Stay cheerful and happy. All the best for the future!!
name: SNEHA KANJICKAL JAMES

comment: Dear Sarvani, you are really a fabulous person to me, I thoroughly enjoyed your company, whatever it may be, particularly, BTS & JK. Our movie nights, late night snacks and walks, I'm gonna miss you both badly and your dance. Hope you also miss me while u are away. Stay happy always:)
name: Nalla Leena

comment:
A girl with great sweetness and kindness . And a big K-drama lover. 
All the best for your future !
name: Khushi Panthi

comment:

comment: Nuvu bookworm enti vroo.. rojantha k-drama lu chuse face needhi..

comment: You are the one I met u online. We had spent a lot of time in room by doing all the rubbish things. Samayam sandharbham lekunda dance chesethav. Eppudu happy ga vundu vroo🤗🤗

comment: You are one of the closest friends I made in campus . No matter what happened I will always cherish those moments. All the best sarvani
name: kanishka padamata

comment: Ahh broo, I'll definitely miss ur slow talking and your smile 🥹🥹 We met and got close in airport and so our friendship is one of my bucket list things. Always stay the same funny and free and all the very best 🥹🫶✌️✌️

comment:

comment: Gulabila jandalamma💕 eppduaina oka smile eskoni untaav sweet ga... samaajam lo naluguru lo oka daanivi nuvve le kaani your comments helps to improve😌 k-drama weeb, bts obsessed, the dancer akka tooooi... will miss threatening you with chicken ❤️‍🩹
